mapper.sql: trial_id, name, detail, img_url, category_id, branch_id, lecturer_id, release_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into trial(name, detail, img_url, category_id, branch_id, lecturer_id, release_time, status) values(#{name}, #{detail}, #{imgUrl}, #{categoryId}, #{branchId}, #{lecturerId}, #{releaseTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: select tr.trial_id, tr.name, tr.detail, tr.img_url, tr.category_id, cat.name 'category_name', tr.branch_id, br.name 'branch_name', tr.lecturer_id, lec.name 'lecturer_name', tr.release_time, tr.status from trial tr join course_category cat on tr.category_id = cat.category_id join branch br on tr.branch_id = br.branch_id join lecturer lec on tr.lecturer_id = lec.lecturer_id where trial_id=#{trialId}
mapper.update: update trial set name=#{name}, detail=#{detail}, img_url=#{imgUrl}, category_id=#{categoryId}, branch_id=#{branchId}, lecturer_id=#{lecturerId}, release_time=#{releaseTime}, status=#{status} where trial_id=#{trialId}
